author: Ryan Dailey
description: A nonprofit charter schools company, Somerset Academy Inc., is betting yes, but it's telling half the teachers, 'You're fired.'
title: Can this Florida school district be saved? A charter school operator hopes so

author: Edd Moore
description: Alex Sawyer and his friends were missed by only 20 metres as the wild weather overnight across England's south west hit Devon, Somerset and Dorset
title: Students almost hit by lightning while trying to film Snapchat clip
